Surfaces#

sportypy produces surface plots for the following sports and their corresponding leagues. Click on the name of the sport to see the base class, or the league to see how to instantiate the league-specific class

  • Baseball
    • Little League
    • MiLB — Minor League Baseball
    • MLB — Major League Baseball
    • NCAA — National Collegiate Athletic Association
    • NFHS — National Federation of State High Schools
    • Pony League
  • Basketball
    • FIBA — Fédération Internationale de Basketball
    • NBA — National Basketball Association
    • NBA G League
    • NCAA — National Collegiate Athletic Association
    • NFHS — National Federation of State High Schools
    • WNBA — Women's National Basketball Association
  • Curling
    • WCF — World Curling Federation
  • Football
    • CFL — Canadian Football League
    • NCAA — National Collegiate Athletic Association
    • NFHS — National Federation of State High Schools
    • NFL — National Football League
  • Hockey
    • AHL — American Hockey League
    • ECHL — East Coast Hockey League
    • IIHF — International Ice Hockey Federation
    • NCAA — National Collegiate Athletic Association
    • NHL — National Hockey League
    • NWHL — National Women's Hockey League (defunct as of 2021)
    • OHL — Ontario Hockey League
    • PHF — Premier Hockey Federation
    • QMJHL — Quebec Major Junior Hockey League
    • USHL — United States Hockey League
  • Soccer
    • EPL — English Premier League
    • FIFA — Fédération Internationale de Football Association
    • MLS — Major League Soccer
    • NCAA — National Collegiate Athletic Association
    • NWSL — National Women's Soccer League
  • Tennis
    • ATP — Association of Tennis Professionals
    • ITA — Intercollegiate Tennis Association
    • ITF — International Tennis Federation
    • NCAA — National Collegiate Athletic Association
    • USTA — United States Tennis Association
    • WTA — World Tennis Association
